title: Impact of historical soil management on the interaction of plant-growth-promoting bacteria with maize (Zea mays L.)
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Rebyson Bissaco Guidinelle, Diego Lang Burak, Otacilio José Passos Rangel, Anderson Lopes Peçanha, Renato Ribeiro Passos, Letícia Oliveira da Rocha, Fábio Lopes Olivares, Eduardo de Sá Mendonça
